title: Deep Learning for Quantum Chemistry
summary: A new method applies deep neural networks to simulate molecular dynamics more efficiently.

title: Novel Biomarkers in Alzheimer's Disease
summary: Study identifies early blood markers that predict cognitive decline in Alzheimer's patients.

title: AI Detects Hidden Patterns in Climate Data
summary: A new machine learning approach uncovers overlooked signals in global temperature trends.

title: CRISPR Advances Enable Gene Editing in Adults
summary: Researchers successfully edit disease-causing genes in adult tissues using CRISPR.
